name: Burning Darkness
description:
Burning Darkness is a Horror-RPG, set in an abandoned villa.

Also you are a duck, for reasons.

Controls:
AWSD     - Movement
E               - Interact / Select (In-Battle)
Escape     - Inventory
H              - Healthpotion

Everything in the game was made by us 2 in 72 hours, using Gamemaker Studio 1.4, Paint.net, sfxr and Ableton Live 9

The only exceptions are a breathing sound and the  pixelated font
